prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that is small and has a bright red body and large claws.
Imagine a Pokemon with a crab-like appearance, featuring vibrant colors and aquatic attributes.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in wetlands, with distinctive claws and a playful personality.
Design a creature that resembles a crustacean with an eye-catching design and a competitive spirit.
Generate a Pokemon that has a unique combination of red and white colors, making it stand out.
Give me a small, lively Pokemon that loves to explore both sea and grassland habitats.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a fierce underwater fighter with striking features.
